parameters.functionScript:
await Noodl.Files.delete(Inputs.FileName);

Outputs.Done();

const user = Noodl.Users.Current

Outputs.Valid = 
Inputs.Auth === true &&
Inputs.UserId === user.UserId;

user.Properties.emailVerified = true
await user.save()
await user.fetch()

user.Properties.emailVerified = false
await user.save()
await user.fetch()

Outputs.Valid2 = user.Properties.emailVerified === false

Outputs.Done()

Outputs.FetchOK = Inputs.Todos.length === 200

Outputs.Done()

Outputs.PostWithInputsOK =
Inputs.Res.id === 101 &&
Inputs.Res.title === "wagga" &&
Inputs.Res.body === "woff";

Outputs.Done()

Outputs.InputsInResponseOK = Inputs.Res.test === "woff"

Outputs.Done()

Outputs.AggOK = Inputs.Names.length === 5 && 
            Inputs.Names.indexOf('Lisa') !== -1 &&
            Inputs.Names.indexOf('Homer') !== -1 &&
            Inputs.Names.indexOf('Marge') !== -1 &&
            Inputs.Names.indexOf('Maggie') !== -1 &&
            Inputs.Names.indexOf('Bart') !== -1 &&
            Inputs.AvgAge == 21.6;

Outputs.Done()

Outputs.FilterOK = Inputs.MaxAge === 42;

Outputs.Done()

parameters.functionScript:
Outputs.JsFilterOK = Inputs.SumAge === 51 && Inputs.MinAge === 11;

Outputs.Done()

Outputs.DeleteOK =
Inputs.AfterCount === Inputs.BeforeCount-1

Outputs.CreateOK = 
Inputs.aBool === true &&
Inputs.aNumber === 17 &&
Inputs.aString === 'Hej' &&
Noodl.Objects[Inputs.Id].AString === Inputs.aString;

Outputs.Done()

Outputs.ReFetchOK =
Inputs.aNumber === 17;

Outputs.CreateAndSetOK =
Noodl.Objects[Inputs.Id].ANumber === 10 &&
Noodl.Objects[Inputs.Id].AString === "Tjohej" &&
Noodl.Objects[Inputs.Id].ABool === true &&

Inputs.ANumber === 10 &&
Inputs.AString === "Tjohej" &&
Inputs.ABool === true;

Outputs.Done()

parameters.functionScript:
Outputs.Test = Inputs.Test + " yes"

console.log("Log test")
console.info("Info test")
console.error("Error test")
Outputs.NoUserCheck = Noodl.Users.Current === undefined && Inputs.UserId === undefined && Inputs.Auth === false

Outputs.HeadersOK = Inputs.Headers['x-parse-session-token'] !== undefined 
&& Inputs.Headers['content-type'] === 'application/json'

Outputs.Done()

Outputs.Code = Math.ceil(Math.random()*15)
Outputs.Text = "Test-" + Outputs.Code

Outputs.Username = "emailtest-" + Math.ceil(Math.random()*1000000)
Outputs.Pw = "emailtest"
Outputs.Email = Outputs.Username + "@test.com"

Outputs.Done()

Outputs.Email = ("emailtest2-" + Math.ceil(Math.random()*1000000)) + "@test.com"

Outputs.Done()

Inputs.Text

parameters.functionScript:
Outputs.Passed = Inputs.Status === 'pass'
Outputs.Failed = Inputs.Status === 'fail'
Outputs.Pending = Inputs.Status === undefined || Inputs.Status === 'pending'
Noodl.Objects['simple-2'].status = 'fail'
Noodl.Objects['simple-5'].status = 'fail'
Noodl.Objects['simple-4'].status = 'fail'

describe('api-2',() => {
    expect(Inputs.QueryOK === true)
    expect(Inputs.FetchOK === true)
    expect(Inputs.CreateAndSaveOK === true)
    expect(Inputs.DeleteOK === true)
    expect(Inputs.RelationsOK === true)
    expect(Inputs.CountOK === true)
    expect(Inputs.DistinctOK === true)
    expect(Inputs.AggregateOK === true)
})

parameters.functionScript:
describe('users-2',() => {
    expect(Inputs.LogInFailedOK === true)
    expect(Inputs.LogInOK === true)
    expect(Inputs.BecomeFailedOK === true)
    expect(Inputs.BecomeOK === true)
    expect(Inputs.Username === "test")
})

Outputs.Next()

await Noodl.Users.become(Inputs.SessionToken)

Outputs.ImpersonateOK = Noodl.Users.Current !== undefined &&
Noodl.Users.Current.username === "test";

Outputs.Done()

Outputs.Username = "test-" + Math.ceil(Math.random()*1000000)
Outputs.Pw = "test"

Outputs.Done()
Noodl.Objects['users-5'].status = 'fail'
